oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1994 Agenda Cover - Henry Morgan and Bayard Boyle, Jr.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Agenda Magazine; magazines; Boyle, Bayard, Jr.; Morgan, Henry; portraits; real estate; Boyle Investment Co.;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The cover of Agenda Magazine from the Jul/Aug 1994 issue. Features a photo of Henry Morgan and Bayard Boyle, Jr. of the Boyle Investment Company, and articles about Melvin Bledsoe, Smith & Nephew Richards, Dave Hersh and the Memphis Chicks, Champion Awards, and the Memphis College of Art.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Gift of Eric Elam (Director of Operations, Greater Memphis Chamber)
